author: Koopa Kart

text: Not only my favorite Silent Hill soundtrack, but my favorite from a horror game. I remember getting the album right when it released and listening to it on loop. To me, it's Yamaoka's masterpiece. The game itself was also terrifyingly good with graphics that still stand up today. The Silent Hill series is the best at building a believable horror atmosphere, making a masterful use of sounds and disturbing settings to scare you in different ways... it's often what you can't see that is scariest. Silent Hill 3 has some of the most memorable moments in the series: mirror room anyone?

author: SupraDarky

text: @SupraDarky Why is the collection disappointing? I haven't played it but how can it be bad if it's the same game with a better resolution.
author: Mr. Fuzzums

text: @Mr. Fuzzums If they would've just improved the resolution, things would've been fine. Not sure about SH3, but in SH2 they lowered the fog thickness, which was a pretty stupid idea, as that was a really important atmosphere element. Also some of the textures look less dirty. That's what I remember at least.
